amendment.description: Amendment directs the CDC to conduct a study to determine whether incentivizing the use of new antibiotics will lead to antibiotic resistance and cause these lifesaving drugs to be less effective.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-193 to direct the CDC to conduct a study to determine how the additional payments are affecting the development of drug resistance.
